HERO.MODE.SANDBOX.TITLE: Sandbox Mode
HERO.MODE.SANDBOX.DESCRIPTION: There is no time limitâ€”you can spend as much time as you want guessing the card name.
HERO.MODE.SANDBOX.RULES.2: - The card back shows which expansion the card comes from.
HERO.MODE.CHALLENGE.TITLE: Challenge Mode
HERO.MODE.CHALLENGE.DESCRIPTION: Same cards, same progress, but you won't see the expansion card back. You can swap modes at any time.
HERO.MODE.CHALLENGE.RULES.2: - Card back is always the same.
HERO.INFO.1: Leaving the page won't reset the game. The score is saved in your browser.
HERO.INFO.2: However, you can always reset your progress by clicking
